text: To train the LLM
there are two major different ways:

training from scratch or
continuous pre-training.

And we have used
continuous pre-training

to give Japanese
capability to English LLM.

But to avoid the
catastrophic forgetting,
we need to have special curriculum

to train the Japanese
capability to English.
Although we have used different
settings of AWS Trainium
and the first one is 64 nodes and
after that we extended up to 512.
We have chosen the 256 is the best for us.

So then that this
could be standard, the setting

for our own use to
develop Japanese LLM.
We can expect 50% reduction

of training cost and the
25% shorter training time.

Once we have such good
Japanese baseline LLM,

we can expect shorter time to
develop customer dedicated LLM.
For example, for financial customers,

we need to train such
model toward specific

business domain
of financial sector
and the tasks in that business.

So we can expect shorter
time to develop such LLM

and a smaller amount of
resource required for that.

So those two are major
benefit for our customers.
